attributes.action: Make disposable BBQs and fires illegal on moorland and public spaces
attributes.additional_details:
A temporary BBQ and fire ban has been brought in by Kirklees Council but we want a nationwide law with heavier fines and potential court action.
https://www.examinerlive.co.uk/news/west-yorkshire-news/bbq-ban-moorland-open-spaces-16180778
https://www.examinerlive.co.uk/news/west-yorkshire-news/taken-more-200-firefighters-finally-16173163
attributes.background:
So far in 2019 there have been several moorland fires across the country.
One of the worst was in Marsden and devastated 10sq kilometres of land killing wildlife and destroying a £360,000 habitat project.
We want new legislation making BBQs or fires on moorland or public space illegal
